1.0.1.name: wordpress/akismet-credit-inserter
1.0.1.description: A very simple mu-plugin to automatically (automattically?) insert a "Spam prevention powered by Akismet" notice (with hyperlink to Akismet.com) in the footer of each blog hosted on a WordPress Multiuser service to abide by the licensing terms of Akismet. Adds a small "Spam prevention powered by Akismet" to the footer of every blog to abide by Akismet licensing terms.
